start.message: 🤖ChatsTodo - Your Virtual Assistant Commands: /task - See your upcoming tasks /event - See your upcoming events /summary - Get a summary of your group chat /all - Get everything above! /help - For any questions or assistance

help.message:
Need some guidance? Here you can learn how to use all the features I offer, including

/task - tracking tasks
/summary - viewing summaries of your groups
/event - managing events
/all - get everything above!

Just type a command!
help.description: Provides help on how to use the bot effectively.

all.message: Looking to get a comprehensive overview? This command fetches summary, tasks and events across your groups for a complete snapshot.
all.description: Retrieves a comprehensive summary from all chat groups.
all.null: It seems there's nothing to report back right now. No tasks or events found across your chats.
all.error: Oops! Encountered an issue fetching a comprehensive overview. Please try again later.

summary.message: Interested in a quick glance at what's going on? I'll bring up a summary of the latest discussions
summary.description: Displays a summary of the latest discussions
summary.null: Currently, there are no updates to summarise for this group.
summary.error: I ran into a problem trying to fetch the summary. Could you try again later?

task.message: Need to focus on what's pending? I'll list out all the tasks that need your attention.
task.null: Looks like you're all caught up! No pending tasks in this group.
task.error: There was an issue retrieving tasks. Please try again shortly.

event.message: Don't miss out on any events! I'll tell you about any upcoming events you should be aware of.
event.null: There are no upcoming events in this group. Time to plan something?
event.error: Encountered a hiccup while trying to gather event details. Please try again later.

feedback.message:
Your feedback is invaluable to us.

Share your thoughts, suggestions, or report any issues you're facing, and help us make ChatsTodo even better for you.
feedback.description: Provide feedback on your experience with the bot, suggest improvements, or report issues.
feedback.error: We're sorry, but we're currently unable to process your feedback. Please try again after some time.
